species.name: musharna
descriptions: It drowses and dreams all the time. It’s best to leave it be if it’s just woken up, as it’s a terrible grump when freshly roused from sleep.
The dream mist coming from its forehead changes into many different colors depending on the dream that was eaten.
The mist emanating from their foreheads is packed with the dreams of people and Pokémon.
When dark mists emanate from its body, don’t get too near. If you do, your nightmares will become reality.
With the mist from its forehead, it can create shapes of things from dreams it has eaten.

abilities.name: forewarn
abilities.effect: Reveals the opponents' strongest move upon entering battle.

abilities.name: synchronize
abilities.effect: Copies burns, paralysis, and poison received onto the Pokémon that inflicted them.

abilities.name: telepathy
abilities.effect: Protects against friendly Pokémon's damaging moves.
